---
title: "document-bulk-signer.ts"
---

## High-level description
This code defines an abstract class `DocumentBulkSigner` and a type `DocumentBulkSignerRequest` for bulk signing documents. It provides a foundation for implementing document signing functionality, likely for patient-related documents in a healthcare or medical context.

## Code Structure
The code consists of two main parts: a type definition (`DocumentBulkSignerRequest`) and an abstract class (`DocumentBulkSigner`). The abstract class serves as a base for concrete implementations of document bulk signing functionality.

## Symbols

### `DocumentBulkSignerRequest`
#### Description
This type defines the structure of a request for bulk document signing.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| patientId | string | Identifier for the patient |
| cxId | string | Likely a customer or context identifier |
| requestId | string | Unique identifier for the request |

### `DocumentBulkSigner`
#### Description
An abstract class that defines the structure for document bulk signing implementations.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| region | string | AWS region where the signing operation will take place |

#### Internal Logic
- The class constructor initializes the `region` property.
- It declares an abstract `sign` method that concrete implementations must define.

### `DocumentBulkSigner.sign`
#### Description
An abstract method that concrete implementations must define to perform the actual document signing.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| request | DocumentBulkSignerRequest | Object containing patientId, cxId, and requestId |

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| - | Promise&lt;void&gt; | A promise that resolves when signing is complete |

## References
The `DocumentBulkSigner` class is referenced and used in the related file `packages/api/src/external/aws/document-bulk-signer-factory.ts`. This factory file creates concrete implementations of `DocumentBulkSigner` based on the environment (development or production).

## Dependencies
The code doesn't explicitly import any external libraries, but it's designed to work within an AWS environment, as indicated by the `region` parameter and the related factory file.

## Configuration
The code itself doesn't define any configuration options, but the related factory file uses a `Config` object to determine the environment and AWS settings.

## API/Interface Reference
The `DocumentBulkSigner` class defines the following interface:

| Method | Inputs | Outputs | Description |
|:-------|:-------|:--------|:------------|
| sign | DocumentBulkSignerRequest | Promise&lt;void&gt; | Abstract method for signing documents in bulk |

This interface is intended to be implemented by concrete classes that provide specific signing functionality, such as `DocumentBulkSignerLambda` and `DocumentBulkSignerLocal` mentioned in the related factory file.
